title: Hyderabad based byteXL – an ed tech start-up expands operation to Maharashtra; to train 2500 students on new-age technologies to become IT Career Ready - Express Computer
content: Hyderabad based byteXL – an ed tech start-up expands operation to Maharashtra; to train 2500 students on new-age technologies to become IT Career Ready  Express Computer
description: The EdTech player aims to train technology students in 50 Institutes in Maharastra on byteXL’s proprietory training modules in the next 1 year
